name: Angel Zapata
text: Really great pizza. Custom make it with what ever you want right in front of you. $6 for a 10-11" pizza with all the toppings you want. Great choices of meats and veggies. On the side next to the soda machine is alot of hot sauce choices. â€¦More

name: Jasmin Hussain
text: Not so impressed. With all the new pizza stores appearing this one is not one of my favorite. It is rather pricey and pizza tastes bland. This pizza store I would only mediocre. Chocolate chip cookie was OK.

name: zero and sora
text: Love the pizza will be coming back again soon.

name: Leo Martinez
text: A good experience the pizza is very very Treasury tasty I would highly recommend this place.

name: Danni Reynolds
text: My husband took the family here to celebrate my birthday a few years ago and everyone loved what they got!  The choices of meats and vegetables are second to none.  I've tried the other make-your-own-pizza places and this is by far my â€¦More

name: Kathy Ford
text: Pizza was delicious! Love that they have the cauliflower crust! Friendly staff. I would say this pizza was better than the similar type pizza places. We'll be back!

name: S F
text: Gluten free allergy pizza is always what I get.  The manager and asst manager here are great!  The manager is so smart and starts making my pizza as soon as i come in.  The asst manager is the greatest guy and always has the biggest smile â€¦More

name: Thu Koeler
text: Love that it's make it the way you want it. Pizza and salad options.  The thin crust is very crispy.  Even the regular dough is crispy.  I don't like how some pizza places makes the dough soft and soggy.   I like the buffalo mozzarella â€¦More

name: Janet Liss
text: They make a good pizza and Alan, the manager, is a delight. He always gives the best customer service!

name: Shannon Gutierrez
text: My fiancÃ© and I go here just about every week. We absolutely love it. We always get the gluten free pizza since she has an allergy, and I must say, of all the gluten free pizza choices out there, this place is the best!

name: Christine Periman
text: We had company from out of town we always had to take him to our favorite pizza spot PizzaRev is the best and a great price.

name: Robot Sidekick
text: It's a good experience when the staff are being nice. Other than that, it's a quick pizza with vegan options. The last time I went though, they sprayed non-stick spray directly on my dough. I know it's not fine dining but I was a little put-off. I'm also glad they have 805 beer.

name: perryjl12
text: Great pizza. Love the options and the ability to customize your pizza. Could have been a 5 star but the people making my pizza did not know enough about their own caulipower pizza. They called it the wrong name "cauliflower pizza" causing â€¦More

name: emily hardwick
text: The pizza is amazing! I made my own pizza with the pesto sauce that they recommended with red sauce, so many things to choose from! I came yesterday for the 1st time and now I'm back again today. They a had deal yesterday but the pizza was so delicious I had to come back today! The staff is pretty cool too! I will be a regular

name: Ms. Cookies
text: The time I've been visiting this place was almost 2 years now. And I havent regretted it the pizza here is amazingly good. I recommend for the people who love thin crust and organic tomatoe sauce. :)

name: servant patriot
text:
Nutrious choices, sensitive to the gluten intolerant, quite tasty, expedient preparation,
nice folks, (wish whole wheat crust were available), close to Edward's 26 (30-60 second walk).

name: Marianne Marquez
text: There was a fly in the parmesan cheese container.  The pizzas were undercooked and we had to send them back. The servers were very nice and polite but it all seemed a bit unsanitary.

name: Mz Jess Jones
text: Very nice staff and good food. The add on $1.99 salad was tasty!!

name: Shahe Keshishian
text: Always Fresh and Organic ingredients, tru the Cauliflower Crust here!##yumm

name: Andrea D
text:
If you miss Pappa Murphy's this place is for you!  And they cook it for you!  Absolutely delicious, fresh ingredients.
Beware the cauliflower crust if you're keto, it has 88g of carbs!  Just eat the toppings off a thin crust and save a little $

name: Cathy McGlothen
text: It was very good all the items fresh.

name: David davidm@graysonâ€”eng.co.nz
text: Great pizza and great service

name: Adrianna90@gmail.com Waxed009
text: Our first time here and my experience was not what I expected, I was reading the bored to see how it works and I mentioned to the first young lady it was our time here so she she said well just tell me what you want traditional or thin â€¦More

name: Mike Noel
text: Good pizza. Penty of choices. love how there's like a taco Tuesday thing but with pizza.

name: Manuel Perez
text: Great pizza,nice choices.

name: Edmundo Leyva
text: Good quality food. Tastes good.  Small portions though. I guess there Target audiencea are those vegan and gluten free people. Better than pieology for sure.

name: Vince Curtis
text: Great pizza at an affordable price. I really like this place - the pizza is quick  - a perfect meal before a movie. The size of the pizza is great also - I am always full after one pizza. Code and pizza is $10, less than movie popcorn ! My fav is the white sauce with different cheeses and sun dried tomatoes. Yum.

name: Lizett Reyes
text: The girl who was making my pizza today March 23 2019 @4:00pm had a little attitude.  She looked annoyed and I didn't felt  free to ask what I wanted on my pizza.

name: ask me
text: Great place to create your own pizza... just needs to be cleaned up a little

name: Consuelo Barba
text: My first time here DELICIOUS!!

name: SD200
text: Great pizza and they have great toppings,  as well, like anchovies and sweet sausage. Very good build your own pizza.

name: Zaiah Etuk
text: Live this place and the people. Me and my buddies all come here for a pizza and they're so helpful and funny. I Love Pizza Rev

name: Alexis Wright
text: Love PizzaRev. Decided to try out the pickup service this time around and my food was ready quickly and delicious

name: Aurelie Orset
text: Great choice of ingredients and sauce to add. The staff is very nice and helpful.

name: Aaliyah Smith
text: The first PizzaRev I've gone to. I remember I was vegan at the time and I very much appreciated all the vegan options. It seems to be doing well so far. Good artisanal pizza.

name: Krypto Panda
text: I like that they give me options.  They have great customer service and their pizza is fresh.  ðŸ˜‰

name: Elliott Olvera
text: Have had multiple orders cancelled through Postmates because they were too busy. Pizza has been delivered with burnt crust on multiple occasions. Have had several orders where there is an ingredient missing although there is a clearly â€¦More

name: Emmanuel Gutierrez
text: Wish the top would be more done

name: Jeremy Draws
text: I miss coming here! It was delicious coming here.

name: Raymond Williams
text: Always a great experience.

name: N W
text: I went with 2 other families and all of our pizzas were gross.   The cheese was nasty and the chicken was unedible. We all ended up throwing our food away.  We waited 30+ minutes to place our order and there was only 5 people ahead of us.  We will never go there again.

name: Huckaroo ramz
text: I like that they have a monthly topping, so every month you can create a new combination, staff is friendly.  The restaurant is always clean.

name: Victor D
text: Love the Tuesday special. Great deals any day of the week.

name: Thomas Tringali
text: Great pizza with any toppings you want and great beer on tap

name: Rodney S
text:
Rev up your engines!  It's time to grab a pizza something delicious!

PizzaRev, located at the Long Beach Towne Center in front of the movie theatre, â€¦More
